name: Marie
title: Lovely Bomber
acquisition_text:
Anything is possible through alchemy.
Shall we find out what we can accomplish together?

profile.voice_text: I'm Marlone from Salburg Academy. I hope my alchemy can be of some assistance.
profile.description: An energetic, tomboyish alchemist who studied alchemy at the academy in a certain town. She now travels across the regions of Lantarna in search of the truth of alchemy. While she is bright and friendly, she can be lazy and a little careless at times. Her tendency to solve problems with bombs has also earned her a reputation as a bomb enthusiast.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg

You want to become stronger? Very well,
I'll drill the spirit of a warrior into you!

profile.voice_text:
I am Lila Decyrus of the Whitefang clan.
A warrior of the Oren race.
profile.description:
A traveling warrior with an enigmatic aura.
Utilizing her exceptional combat skills, she takes on jobs such as bodyguard missions.
She has traveled extensively with the alchemist Empel.
She has a surprisingly nurturing side to her, despite her calm, collected, and somewhat unsociable demeanor.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout

It's the duty of the older generation to give a push when needed.
Come on, all of you! Give it your best shot!

profile.voice_text:
The misuse of alchemy
for nefarious deeds...
If true, the intent behind this must be carefully evaluated.
profile.description:
A wandering alchemist.
He investigates ruins throughout the land, all with a specific goal in mind. He once met Ryza and her companions on an island while on an investigation and joined them in their endeavors for awhile. Although he appears young, he is mature in his speech and actions, giving him a mysterious air of authority.
He also has a notable sweet tooth.

Having been taught by her father, who was a knight, she is skilled with the sword.

A fledgling alchemist. She is very passionate about alchemy and has an unparalleled love and knowledge of the subject, which is evident in her tendency to get excited and talk very fast.
Her dream is to revive the neglected art of alchemy and use it to enrich people's lives.

I'll overcome anything to make my dream

She presents a stoic front, speaking little, but she is a compassionate soul dedicated to the cause of the people.
